name: Jigsaw Collection Puzzle
description:
Welcome to Enjoy Playing Puzzle Jigsaw Game and Free Download Today!

how to play

Select a picture from the images camera or take a photo that you want to play.

Then select the category you want to play, there are 2 categories is Easy and Hard.

Suitable for preschool children.

You do not have to spend money to buy puzzles jigsaw to download free apps.

Up to 18 images can be change at any time.
